name: AVAudioFormat
desc: An object that describes the representation of an audio format.

items.name: init(standardFormatWithSampleRate: Double, channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout)
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance as a deinterleaved float with the specified sample rate and channel layout.

items.name: init?(standardFormatWithSampleRate: Double, channels: AVAudioChannelCount)
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance with the specified sample rate and channel count.

items.name: init?(commonFormat: AVAudioCommonFormat, sampleRate: Double, channels: AVAudioChannelCount, interleaved: Bool)
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance.

items.name: init(commonFormat: AVAudioCommonFormat, sampleRate: Double, interleaved: Bool, channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout)
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance with the specified audio format, sample rate, interleaved state, and channel layout.

items.name: init?(settings: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance using the specified settings dictionary.

items.name: init?(streamDescription: UnsafePointer<AudioStreamBasicDescription>)
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance from a stream description.

items.name: init?(streamDescription: UnsafePointer<AudioStreamBasicDescription>, channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout?)
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance from a stream description and channel layout.

items.name: init(cmAudioFormatDescription: CMAudioFormatDescription)
items.desc: Creates an audio format instance from a Core Media audio format description.

items.name: var streamDescription: UnsafePointer<AudioStreamBasicDescription>
items.desc: The audio format properties of a stream of audio data.

items.name: func isEqual(Any) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the audio format instance and a specified object are functionally equivalent.

items.name: var sampleRate: Double
items.desc: The audio format sampling rate, in hertz.

items.name: var channelCount: AVAudioChannelCount
items.desc: The number of channels of audio data.

items.name: var channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout?
items.desc: The underlying audio channel layout.

items.name: var formatDescription: CMAudioFormatDescription
items.desc: The audio format description to use with Core Media APIs.

items.name: var isInterleaved: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the samples mix into one stream.

items.name: var isStandard: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format is in a deinterleaved native-endian float state.

items.name: var commonFormat: AVAudioCommonFormat
items.desc: The common format identifier instance.

items.name: var settings: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary that represents the format as a dictionary using audio setting keys.

items.name: var magicCookie: Data?
items.desc: An object that contains metadata that encoders and decoders require.

items.name: enum AVAudioCommonFormat
items.desc: The format options that describe common audio formats.
